Posts.EditableText:
two questions. ATTGWTF stands for: A Train Trip Gone Way Too Far

A:How do i make the player begin the game starting with items without making objects and making them hidden or invisible?
B:How do i add sound/music to the game (room to room or according to scripts)?
Posts.HTML:
two questions. ATTGWTF stands for: A Train Trip Gone Way Too Far

A:How do i make the player begin the game starting with items without making objects and making them hidden or invisible?
B:How do i add sound/music to the game (room to room or according to scripts)?

Posts.EditableText:
A, you the startscript to 'give' the objects to the player when the game starts. (Click game on the left, the 'when game starts' should be staring at you, click the edit script button.)

B, edit room's 'when player enters room' script, you'll find a 'pictures and sounds' section in the commands', open that, pick the sound thing you want.... Should be obvious.

You could've found this out yourself with a few minutes of looking around...
Posts.HTML:
